name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Mix hot pasta with pancetta, then add egg mixture.
Serve with extra Parmesan and black pepper.

name: Chicken Stir Fry
instructions: Heat oil in a wok or large frying pan.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes.
Add soy sauce and ginger, cook for another minute.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.
